description: This header defines a mock class `CloudStoreImplementationMock` used for testing. The class inherits from multiple interfaces related to a store system, including notification, cache, inspector, and limit interfaces, and utilizes Google Mock macros to create mock methods corresponding to those interfaces.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A Google Mock class simulating the CloudStore implementation, inheriting from multiple store-related interfaces to facilitate unit testing.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback with the store.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback from the store.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in the store under a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the value for a key in the store.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a key in the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace in the store.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification in the second store interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration in the second store interface.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair with scope, including TTL.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value with scope, potentially returning TTL.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a scoped key.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a scoped namespace.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving available namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting a storage limit for a namespace.
